attributes.action: Impose a ban on the use of elephants in any british circus.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Animal use in entertainment has slowly reared its ugly head and crept back into the British circus,Many other E.U members have now banned such activity branding it as 'cruel'.
I urge you to sign this petition now to stop any future use of elephants and other animals in the so-called name of entertainment.
Remember animals have the right to freedom too.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
